google_play_reviews.content: Looks nice and simple BUT if you have under-display fingerprint, you would have to double tap to get to the actual fingerprint.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: It's hard to implement functionality for under-display fingerprint scanners, because every device has it positioned differently. That's why I won't add functionality for that.
